org.mini2Dx.minibus

Class MessageBus

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.minibus.MessageBus

  • public class MessageBus
extends java.lang.Object
    A message bus to publishing MessageDatas

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(float delta)
        Updates all MessageExchanges
        Parameters:
        delta - (in seconds) The timestep or amount of time that has elapsed since the last frame

      • createImmediateExchange

        public MessageExchange createImmediateExchange(MessageHandler... messageHandlers)
        Creates a ImmediateMessageExchange that processes messages immediately when they are received
        Parameters:
        messageHandlers - The MessageHandler instances for processing messages received by the MessageExchange
        Returns:
        A new ImmediateMessageExchange

      • createIntervalExchange

        public MessageExchange createIntervalExchange(float interval,
                                              MessageHandler messageHandlers)
        Creates a IntervalMessageExchange that processes messages after a certain amount of time has elapsed.
        Parameters:
        interval - The interval between processing MessageDatas (in seconds)
        messageHandlers - The MessageHandler instances for processing messages received by the MessageExchange
        Returns:
        A new IntervalMessageExchange

      • createOnUpdateExchange

        public MessageExchange createOnUpdateExchange(MessageHandler... messageHandlers)
        Creates a OnUpdateMessageExchange that processes messages when update(float) is called
        Parameters:
        messageHandlers - The MessageHandler instances for processing messages received by the MessageExchange
        Returns:
        A new OnUpdateMessageExchange

      • createConcurrentExchange

        public MessageExchange createConcurrentExchange(MessageHandler... messageHandlers)
        Creates a ConcurrentMessageExchange that processes messages on its own Thread. The exchanger/thread can be stopped by calling MessageExchange.dispose()
        Parameters:
        messageHandlers - The MessageHandler instances for processing messages received by the MessageExchange
        Returns:
        A new ConcurrentMessageExchange running on its own thread

      • broadcast

        public void broadcast(java.lang.String messageType)
        Broadcasts a message to all MessageExchanges from an anonymous source
        Parameters:
        messageType - The message type

      • broadcast

        public void broadcast(java.lang.String messageType,
                      MessageData messageData)
        Broadcasts a message with MessageData to all MessageExchanges from an anonymous source
        Parameters:
        messageType - The message type
        messageData - The MessageData to be published

      • broadcast

        public void broadcast(MessageExchange source,
                      java.lang.String messageType)
        Broadcasts a message to all MessageExchanges from a specified MessageExchange
        Parameters:

        messageType - The message type

        Parameters:

        messageData - The MessageData to broadcast

        destination - The MessageExchange the MessageData is sent to

        destination - The MessageExchange the MessageData is sent to

        messageType - The message type

      • broadcastQuery

        public void broadcastQuery(java.lang.String messageType,
                           java.lang.String responseMessageType,
                           MessageHandler queryHandler)
        Broadcasts a message and calls a MessageHandler when a response message is received.
        Parameters:
        messageType - The message type to send
        responseMessageType - The required message type of the response
        queryHandler - The MessageHandler to call when the response is received

      • broadcastQuery

        public void broadcastQuery(java.lang.String messageType,
                           java.lang.String responseMessageType,
                           boolean requiresDirectResponse,
                           MessageHandler queryHandler)
        Broadcasts a message and calls a MessageHandler when a response message is received.
        Parameters:
        messageType - The message type to send
        responseMessageType - The required message type of the response
        requiresDirectResponse - True if a direct response is required. A direct response is a message sent explicitly from a MessageExchange to the MessageExchange used to send the query.
        queryHandler - The MessageHandler to call when the response is received

      • broadcastQuery

        public void broadcastQuery(java.lang.String messageType,
                           MessageData messageData,
                           java.lang.String responseMessageType,
                           MessageHandler queryHandler)
        Broadcasts a message and calls a MessageHandler when a response message is received.
        Parameters:
        messageType - The message type to send
        messageData - The MessageData to send
        responseMessageType - The required message type of the response
        queryHandler - The MessageHandler to call when the response is received

      • broadcastQuery

        public void broadcastQuery(java.lang.String messageType,
                           MessageData messageData,
                           java.lang.String responseMessageType,
                           boolean requiresDirectResponse,
                           MessageHandler queryHandler)
        Broadcasts a message and calls a MessageHandler when a response message is received.
        Parameters:
        messageType - The message type to send
        messageData - The MessageData to send
        responseMessageType - The required message type of the response
        requiresDirectResponse - True if a direct response is required. A direct response is a message sent explicitly from a MessageExchange to the MessageExchange used to send the query.
        queryHandler - The MessageHandler to call when the response is received

      • getQueryMessagePoolSize

        public int getQueryMessagePoolSize()
        Returns the amount of QueryMessageExchange instances available
        Returns:
        0 if no queries have ever completed

      • getAnonymousExchangeId

        public int getAnonymousExchangeId()
        Returns the id of the MessageExchange used for anonymous sending
        Returns:

      • getTotalActiveExchanges

        public int getTotalActiveExchanges()
        Returns the total amount of active MessageExchanges (including QueryMessageExchanges
        Returns:
